data.eml:eml: On the taxonomic placement of Geodromicus pusillus Coiffait, 1983 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V. (2012): On the taxonomic placement of Geodromicus pusillus Coiffait, 1983 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae). Zootaxa 3552: 66-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211095
